entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow with risk of freezing rain. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 9:34 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with rain or snow beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 9:34 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
